General.Name: CNTus Sungjin Co. Ltd.
General.Description: CNTUS Co.,Ltd manufactures and sells air filters and masks. It offers air filters, such as air cleaner, vacuum cleaner, cabin air, and HVAC filters for air purifiers, automobiles, and other applications; and industrial masks, including disposable particulate masks, half face piece respirators, and particulate filters for industrial applications and regular consumers. CNTUS Co.,Ltd also develops water solution products comprising showerhead filters, and bathroom and kitchen sink faucet aerators; and manufactures and sells water purifier filter fabrics. The company was formerly known as Cntus-Sungjin Co.,Ltd. and changed its name to CNTUS Co.,Ltd in November 2022. CNTUS Co.,Ltd was incorporated in 2003 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea.
